english.segment1: Endless streets of black. Leading nowhere it seems. Lessons from being trapped. Inside a dream
english.segment2: For some it's play. Many choose to walk away
english.segment3: Can somebody tell me. What am I doing here?. I need to know if. It's all been a waste of time?
english.segment4: I hope we make it. I hope we will survive. These are the questions. Running through my mind
english.segment5: Scarring our skin with the. Color blue. I don't know if I can go on. Without you
english.segment6: For some it's play. Many choose to walk away. From the demons pulling you in. Blinded by the light you can't defend
english.segment7: Forest brown with fields of red. Remembering all the things we did. Bridges always join us together. I wish this time could last forever
